mapper.select: SELECT pm_dormitory_manager.id AS 'dormitory_manager_id', pm_dormitory_manager.name AS 'dormitory_manager_name', pm_dormitory_manager.id_number, pm_dormitory_manager.gender, pm_dormitory_manager.birth, pm_dormitory_manager.political_status, pm_dormitory_manager.employment_status, pm_dormitory_manager.education, pm_dormitory_manager.address, pm_dormitory_manager.manager_address, pm_dormitory_manager.manager_count, pm_phone_number.phone_number, pm_dormitory_manager.create_time AS 'dormitory_manager_create_time', pm_dormitory_manager.update_time AS 'dormitory_manager_update_time', pm_dormitory_manager.system_user_id, pm_dormitory_manager.company_id, pm_company.name AS 'company_name', pm_system_user.username FROM pm_dormitory_manager LEFT JOIN pm_company ON pm_dormitory_manager.company_id = pm_company.id LEFT JOIN pm_system_user ON pm_dormitory_manager.system_user_id = pm_system_user.id LEFT JOIN pm_dormitory_manager_phone_number ON pm_dormitory_manager.id = pm_dormitory_manager_phone_number.dormitory_manager_id LEFT JOIN pm_phone_number ON pm_dormitory_manager_phone_number.phone_number_id = pm_phone_number.id WHERE pm_dormitory_manager.id = #{id}
